T02D2574:37b-1: a'arya manydza shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti tsakra ma ra m'a ra ya mantra /
T02D2574:37b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor los gsad pa /
T02D2574:37b-4: 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2574:37b-6: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug po //
T02D2574:37b-7: bco brgyad spyan dmar gnyis kyis mdzes //
T02D2574:37b-8: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2574:37b-10: ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor lo brtsam //
T02D2574:38a-2: ma rungs 'dul ba'i blon mchog gis //
T02D2574:38a-3: dpal ldan 'byor ba drug rdzas bsog / srid pa'i ri bo pham byas te //
T02D2574:38a-4: sems can ngan song rnam par sbyangs //
T02D2574:38a-5: don yod 'gro ba'i don byas te //
T02D2574:38a-6: gtso bo dkon mchog lhur blang zhing //
T02D2574:38a-7: bla ma phyag byar 'os pa la //
T02D2574:38a-8: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni 'bad de bsags //
T02D2574:38a-9: srid pa'i 'dod chags rnam spangs te //
T02D2574:38a-10: stong pa nyid dga' stong ba'i blos //
T02D2574:38a-11: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2574:38a-12: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge bral //
T02D2574:38a-13: shes rab chen po'i skad cig gis //
T02D2574:38a-14: chos kun ngo bo nyid med bya //
T02D2574:38a-15: 'on kyang snang ba ma bkag pas //
T02D2574:38a-16: chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la //
T02D2574:38a-17: ye shes skar ma lam me pa //
T02D2574:38a-18: rang sems nyams su myong ba de //
T02D2574:38a-19: dgag tu btub pa ma yin pas //
T02D2574:38a-20: rang rig sems kyi cho 'phrul du //
T02D2574:38a-21: yi ge'i phreng bas nye bar mjos [?] //
T02D2574:38a-23: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
T02D2574:38a-24: rim pa bzhi yis dkyil 'khor brtsegs //
T02D2574:38a-26: mthun 'jug spyod yul bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2574:38a-27: ri rab gzhal yas khang yang brtsegs //
T02D2574:38a-29: dbus su glang chen bsnol ba'i khri //
T02D2574:38a-30: nyi zla ba padma mdangs bskyed de //
T02D2574:38a-32: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon byang chub //
T02D2574:38a-33: ye shes lnga rdzogs bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2574:38a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog / dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal mnga' ba //
T02D2574:38a-35: rgyan rnams kun gyis sbras pa ni //
T02D2574:38a-37: nyi ma'i snying po 'am gser gyi mdog / phyag bzhi ba la zhi ba'i sku //
T02D2574:38a-38: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu bsams //
T02D2574:38a-39: de yi thugs kar 'khor lo dang //
T02D2574:38a-40: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom //
T02D2574:38a-42: 'og min gnas mchog dam pa nas //
T02D2574:38a-43: rnam snang chen po la sogs pa'i //
T02D2574:38a-44: dkyil 'khor chen po drug byon te //
T02D2574:38a-45: thugs ka'i zla steng bzhugs pa la //
T02D2574:38a-46: bkur sti rim gros mnyes par bya //
T02D2574:38a-47: shes rab 'khor lo la blo gtad //
T02D2574:38a-48: ye shes phreng sngags bzlas pa brtsam //
T02D2574:38a-49: ye shes lnga yi sgo nas bstod //
T02D2574:38a-50: gal te zhi bas ma 'dul zhing //
T02D2574:38a-51: de rnams gzhi dang bcas pa kun //
T02D2574:38b-0: chos kyi @38b dbyings su thim 'gyur te //
T02D2574:38b-1: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa'i //
T02D2574:38b-2: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2574:38b-3: chos kyi dbyings las drag por bzhengs //
T02D2574:38b-4: ye ge drug po ye shes sgras //
T02D2574:38b-5: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
T02D2574:38b-6: rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrog / nam mkha'i mtha' yas sgra sgrogs pas //
T02D2574:38b-7: h'um las drag por skyes pa ni //
T02D2574:38b-8: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2574:38b-9: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
T02D2574:38b-10: spyan dmar bco brgyad phyag bcu gnyis //
T02D2574:38b-11: rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje dang //
T02D2574:38b-12: padma rin chen rgya gram bsnams //
T02D2574:38b-13: g-yas pa'i phyag na legs par bsnams //
T02D2574:38b-14: mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa //
T02D2574:38b-15: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya dang po ni //
T02D2574:38b-16: rdo rje ral gri ma lus gcod //
T02D2574:38b-17: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya pha rol bsdigs //
T02D2574:38b-18: lhag pa'i phyag rgya gzhan rnams na //
T02D2574:38b-19: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2574:38b-20: ha la ha la dug ltar bzhang [?] //
T02D2574:38b-21: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //
T02D2574:38b-22: ral pa gyen brdzes thod phreng la //
T02D2574:38b-23: sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan 'dzin //
T02D2574:38b-24: sprul dang thod rlon phreng bas klubs //
T02D2574:38b-26: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:38b-27: rngam pa chen por bdag nyid gyur //
T02D2574:38b-28: thugs kar nyi ma'i steng na h'um //
T02D2574:38b-29: de yi byin rlabs ya mtshan ni //
T02D2574:38b-30: aom aa ra pa tsa na ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2574:38b-31: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'u rta ye ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2574:38b-32: aom du: kha tstshe da ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2574:38b-33: aom badzra t'ikshna ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2574:38b-34: aom w'a g'i shva ra ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2574:38b-35: aom dzny'a na k'a ya ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2574:38b-36: aom h'um h'um sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02D2574:38b-37: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'a na dzny'a na m'urti /
T02D2574:38b-38: b'a g'i shva ri ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharm'a ga ga na /
T02D2574:38b-39: aa ma la su ba ri shuddha dharm'a tu dzny'a na garbhra h'um /
T02D2574:38b-40: khro bo'i rgyal po h'um las byung //
T02D2574:38b-42: rim pa 'di ltar khros pas gnas //
T02D2574:38b-43: mnar med gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:38b-44: zhal gzhig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2574:38b-45: gti mug gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:38b-47: zhe sdang gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:38b-48: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2574:38b-49: 'dod chags gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:38b-51: nga rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:38b-52: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen 'dzin /
T02D2574:38b-53: phrag dog gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2574:39a-1: g-yon pas kun kyang 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2574:39a-2: sprul dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2574:39a-3: dus mtha'i me dpung nang na bzhugs //
T02D2574:39a-4: brkyang bskum zhabs kyis gshin rje brdzis //
T02D2574:39a-5: re re'i sku la khro bo'i tshogs //
T02D2574:39a-6: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02D2574:39a-7: grangs med mtha' yas pa yis bskor //
T02D2574:39a-8: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
T02D2574:39a-9: de ltar gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2574:39a-10: ye shes khro bo nye bar bsdu //
T02D2574:39a-13: h'um badzra kro dha sa pa ri w'a re badzra
T02D2574:39a-14: sa manta ae hye hi dri shya dza: h'um bam
T02D2574:39a-15: ho: zhes rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams
T02D2574:39a-16: / khro bor byon nas nye bar byon //
T02D2574:39a-17: rgyal ba mchod pas mnyes byas te //
T02D2574:39a-18: bdag dang gnyis su med par bzhugs //
T02D2574:39a-19: gsang sngags rgyal pos gzi mdangs bskyed //
T02D2574:39a-20: 'jam dpal mtshan ni khros pas brjod //
T02D2574:39a-21: gsang sngags rgyal po khros pas bzlas //
T02D2574:39a-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo'i sku //
T02D2574:39a-23: dbye ba dpag med skye ba yis //
T02D2574:39a-24: khams gsum khro bos bkang byas te //
T02D2574:39a-25: rdo rje khro bo'i dmag tshogs kyis //
T02D2574:39a-26: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byas te //
T02D2574:39a-27: gsad cing mnan pa kho nar zad //
T02D2574:39a-28: sprul pa nye bar bsdu bya ste //
T02D2574:39a-29: rdo rje 'jigs byed sogs kyis bstod //
T02D2574:39a-30: de ltar brtan pa stobs su 'gyur //
T02D2574:39a-31: gal te ting 'dzin mi gsal na //
T02D2574:39a-32: dmigs pa rtse gcig cho ga bya //
T02D2574:39a-33: dus mtha'i dgra bo gsad pa ni //
T02D2574:39a-34: ma rungs 'dul ba'i sems kyis su //
T02D2574:39a-35: dur khrod thod pa mi srun gshags //
T02D2574:39a-36: nang du gshin rje'i rgyal po bri //
T02D2574:39a-37: kha gdangs par ni shin tu gsal //
T02D2574:39a-38: 'og ma gshin rje'i khang par bcad //
T02D2574:39a-39: ya gnag bcu bdun mun pa'i smag / sgo med sgo nga lta bu'i nang //
T02D2574:39a-40: yid kyis gzugs brnyan rdzu 'phrul ldan //
T02D2574:39a-41: dgra bo'i rnam shes rlung 'dra ba //
T02D2574:39a-42: srog dang 'grogs te chud gyur na //
T02D2574:39a-43: slar ri thon pa'i skal med do //
T02D2574:39a-44: gshin rjes zin pas mi 'chor ro //
T02D2574:39a-45: gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i snying gi dkyil //
T02D2574:39a-46: srog ba rtsa yi rang bzhin las //
T02D2574:39a-47: ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor lo bca' //
T02D2574:39a-48: rtsibs drug la sogs gsang sngags bcas //
T02D2574:39a-49: kun la 'chi rkyen spel te bri'o //
T02D2574:39a-50: aom aa ra pa tsa sha tr'um che ge mo m'a ra ya /
T02D2574:39a-51: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urtta ya /
T02D2574:39b-0: aom du: khatstshe da sha tr'um m'a ra ya @39b aom badzra t'i kshna sha tr'um m'a ra ya /
T02D2574:39b-1: aom pa' g'i shva ra sha tru'um m'a ra ya /
T02D2574:39b-2: aom dzny'a na k'a ya sha tr'um m'a ra ya /
T02D2574:39b-3: aom h'um h'um h'um sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02D2574:39b-4: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'a na dznya na m'urti
T02D2574:39b-5: b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharmma
T02D2574:39b-6: ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha
T02D2574:39b-7: / dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha h'um /
T02D2574:39b-8: sha tr'u m'a ra ya h'um phat ces /
T02D2574:39b-9: gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dran pas /
T02D2574:39b-10: gang dmigs gdug pa nye bar 'jig //
T02D2574:39b-11: rang rgyud gnas nas gshin rje bkug / thod pa rang byung de la bstim //
T02D2574:39b-12: gdug pa'i gnas nas dgra bo dgug / mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan de la bstim //
T02D2574:39b-13: bdag nyid snying ga'i sngags 'od kyis //
T02D2574:39b-14: dgra bo'i snying ga'i 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2574:39b-15: lte ba 'khor zhing rtsibs kyis gcod //
T02D2574:39b-16: gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i tshe srog phral //
T02D2574:39b-17: lung stong me mar me ltar 'gyur //
T02D2574:39b-18: gzugs de 'khor los dum bur gtub //
T02D2574:39b-19: drag po'i gtor mar bcug byas te //
T02D2574:39b-20: thod nang gshin rje de la sbyin //
T02D2574:39b-21: chos skyong srung mar bsgo bya ste //
T02D2574:39b-22: rang gi gnas su chi bder btang //
T02D2574:39b-23: gtor ma dag kyang lho phyogs bskyal //
T02D2574:39b-24: de nas rang nyid brtan byas te //
T02D2574:39b-25: cho ga ma lus rdzogs par bya //
T02D2574:39b-26: spyi dang khyad par rim pa yis //
T02D2574:39b-27: bsdus rgyas bye brag shes par bya //
T02D2574:39b-28: tha ma'i rgyud drag dang thung che //
T02D2574:39b-30: sangs rgyas sgrub la bar gcod cing //
T02D2574:39b-31: byang chub tshe srog 'phrog byed la //
T02D2574:39b-32: 'khor lo 'di yis gcod gyur cig / de yi nus pa bskyed nas ni //
T02D2574:39b-33: bdud dgra thams cad pham byas nas //
T02D2574:39b-34: phas kyi rgol ba nyer zhi ste //
T02D2574:39b-35: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam
T02D2574:39b-36: dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags
T02D2574:39b-37: kyi byad kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2574:39b-38: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2574:39b-39: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
